lead_paragraph: The players, coaches and fans in Mankato, Minn., for the Vikings’ training camp seem certain that Brett Favre will be joining the team soon.
snippet: The players, coaches and fans in Mankato, Minn., for the Vikings’ training camp seem certain that Brett Favre will be joining the team soon.

headline.print_headline: WAITING GAMES BEGIN, BUT FOR DIFFERENT ENDS; No Sign of Favre, but Vikings Don’t Seem to Mind
headline.main: No Sign of Favre at Camp, but the Vikings Don’t Seem to Mind
headline.seo: Players, Coaches and Fans Expect Favre to Return
headline.sub: No Sign of Favre, but the Vikings Don’t Seem to Mind;
